install.table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ng_business_plug` ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '业务id', `name` varchar(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '业务名称', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态0关闭，1开启', `data` text NOT NULL COMMENT '配置信息', `ctime` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', `mtime` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '修改时间', `bid` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '小b商家的id', `pid` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '插件id', `mix_id` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '活动标识：运营者id_商家id_插件id_活动自己id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='小b商家与插件关系表';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ng_knowledge_repo` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type` char(2) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型', `cate` char(2) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分类0未分配', `sub_cate` char(2) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '子分类', `question` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '题目', `ans_options` text COMMENT '题目附加,json格式', `question_ext` text COMMENT '题目扩展', `answer` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '答案，json格式', `ans_explain` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '答案解释', `author` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '作者', `mtime` int(11) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改时间', `ctime` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `level` int(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '题目难度等级', `level_name` varchar(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '等级名称', `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态0删除1正常', `private` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '题目是否固定0否，1是', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idx_cate` (`cate`,`sub_cate`), KEY `idx_author` (`author`), KEY `idx_type` (`type`), KEY `level` (`level`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='活动题库表';
